Ma Jingxiang

Group (2024-present):
CLOSE YOUR EYES

Introduction

Ma Jing Xiang is a member of the predebut boy group CLOSE YOUR EYES under UNCORE. He participated in the survival show Boys Planet and is a former member of the pre-debut Chinese boy group Midsummer Cubs.

On December 26, 2022, Ma Jing Xiang was introduced as a contestant on Mnet's survival show Boys Planet when he was chosen by the trainees as one of the 'Shiny Boys'. He was officially revealed as a contestant on December 29th, 2022, alongside the other trainees. He was eliminated from the show in episode 8 after ranking 30th place.

On September 26, 2024, he was announced as a contestant on JTBC's survival show PROJECT7, which began airing in October 2024. He successfully secured a spot in the final lineup, placing 1st, and became a member of the group CLOSE YOUR EYES.
